title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Feb. 17, 1923. Announcement by the Messinian Brotherhood.

div.bibl: Saloniki, Feb. 17, 1923. ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE MESSINIAN BROTHERHOOD.

body.p: p. 3- We hereby notify the members of the Messinian Brotherhood that on Sunday, March 4, 1923, will occur the election of the executive committee of the Brother-hood, in accordance with article no. 8 of its constitution.
The election will take place in the offices of the Brotherhood, Minerva Hall, 522 South Halsted street.
Applications for candidacy will be accepted up to February 26, 1923.
